summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for the period of March 1, 2014, to March 31, 2014. It details various debits and credits, including preauthorized debits for taxes and fees, as well as checks paid.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial transactions detailed in the document.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: Deutsche Bank Trust Co. Americas, NY 10154
keyFacts: The document summarizes account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank.
The account had a beginning balance of $551,878.43 on March 1, 2014.
Multiple preauthorized debits for taxes and fees were recorded throughout March 2014.
The ending balance as of March 31, 2014, was $39,797.23.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.
